bibl.title: A Checklist of Bishops in Byzantine Egypt (A.D. 325-c. 750).
bibl.note: The most recent list of bishops in Byzantine Egypt, compiled by G. FEDALTO, Hierarchia Ecclesiastica Orientalis. II. Patriarchatus Alexandriae, Antiochae, Hierosolymitanae (Padova, 1988), does not pay any attention to the evidence of documentary papyri. - A. (Arch-)Bishops in Greek documentary papyri and inscriptions from Byzantine Egypt. - B. Bishops in Coptic documentary sources from Byzantine Egypt. - C. Bishops in Greek and Coptic (semi)-literary sources. - D. [Miscellaneous].
bibl.seg: WORP K.A., A Checklist of Bishops in Byzantine Egypt (A.D. 325-c. 750).

The most recent list of bishops in Byzantine Egypt, compiled by G. FEDALTO, Hierarchia Ecclesiastica Orientalis. II. Patriarchatus Alexandriae, Antiochae, Hierosolymitanae (Padova, 1988), does not pay any attention to the evidence of documentary papyri. - A. (Arch-)Bishops in Greek documentary papyri and inscriptions from Byzantine Egypt. - B. Bishops in Coptic documentary sources from Byzantine Egypt. - C. Bishops in Greek and Coptic (semi)-literary sources. - D. [Miscellaneous].
